gsm.mapping: Good Statistical Monitoring Mapping

Source: R/gsm.mapping-package.R
gsm.mapping-package.Rd

The Good Statistical Monitoring or 'gsm' R package provides a framework for statistical data monitoring. 'gsm.mapping' provides workflows to apply the necessary data transformation from raw/source datasets to appropriate domains.

See also

Useful links:

  • https://github.com/Gilead-BioStats/gsm.mapping

  • https://gilead-biostats.github.io/gsm.mapping

  • Report bugs at https://github.com/Gilead-BioStats/gsm.mapping/issues
